last_episode_to_air.name: Paddington Calls the Shots
last_episode_to_air.overview: Paddington makes a movie for a film festival, things go wrong.

name: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
overview:
The Adventures of Paddington Bear was a Canadian/French animated children's television series. It was based on the book Paddington Bear by Michael Bond and written by Bruce Robb. It was produced by Cinar and Protecrea and ran for 117 episodes.

The show aired in the United States on the Cookie Jar Toons block on This TV from November 2008 - August 2009. However, all CINAR references in these broadcasts have been replaced by Cookie Jar references. It was also shown on HBO.

episodes.name: A Visit to the Hospital
episodes.overview: Paddington accidentally lands Mr. Curry in the hospital. His visit to the hospital gets an over privileged Mr. Curry back on his feet.

episodes.name: Paddington Takes to the Road
episodes.overview: In Paris, Paddington gets involved in a Tour de France bike race. He wins, making the Castille Village famous.

episodes.name: The Last Dance
episodes.overview: Paddington practices dancing for a Charity Ball. His dance with his partner doesn't go as planned, but wins first place.

episodes.name: Paddington Goes Underground
episodes.overview: Padding travels back and forth on the London Underground trains, with Judy and Mrs. Brown looking for him.

episodes.name: Paddington in the Ring
episodes.overview: In Japan, Paddington visits a Sumo Wrestling school, but in training confronts and eventually outwits the champion Yokozuna.

episodes.name: Mr. Curry lets off Steam
episodes.overview: Paddington accidentally locks Mr. Curry in Mr. Brown's birthday surprise Sauna, but eventually manages to rescue him.

episodes.name: A Visit to the Bank
episodes.overview: Paddington thinks his money has been stolen in a robbery. He is then mistaken for the suspect.

episodes.name: A Spot of Fishing
episodes.overview: Paddington goes on a fishing trip with Mr. Gruber and Admiral Grundae. They are all marooned on an island.

episodes.name: Bear's Job Week
episodes.overview: Paddington participates in Job Week hoping to raise money for Aunt Lucy. Helping Mr. Curry seems to spell disaster, but it works out well.

episodes.name: Paddington And The Stately Home
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber takes Judy, Jonathan and Paddington to the Lucman stately home. Paddington causes Lucman some inconvenience during the tour.

episodes.name: The Opal of My Eye
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber and Paddington go on a tour of the opal mining capital Coober Pedy. By chance, Paddington uncovers Black Opals.

episodes.name: Too Much off the Top
episodes.overview: Paddington helps out at Mr. Sloop's barber shop.

episodes.name: Adventure at the Seaside
episodes.overview: The Brown family go to the beach. Paddington is washed out to sea, but is rescued by two fishermen.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Pyramid Selling
episodes.overview: On a visit in Egypt with Mr. Gruber, Paddington is conned by a trickster, but Gruber sorts him out.

episodes.name: The Finishing Touch
episodes.overview: Paddington buys Mr. Gruber a rock as 'the finishing touch' for his patio.

episodes.name: Paddington Turns Detective
episodes.overview: Padding does detective work to find who stole Mr. Brown's prized pumpkin, but unwittingly gets a common burglar to be caught.

episodes.name: Seeing is Believing
episodes.overview: Paddington and Mr. Gruber help a young girl to rekindle her fascination of Leprechaun stories.

episodes.name: A Visit to the Theatre
episodes.overview: The Brown family go to watch a play at the theatre. Paddington goes backstage and helps to improve the performance.

episodes.name: Paddington at the Wheel
episodes.overview: Paddington decides to take Mr. Brown's driving test for him.

episodes.name: Howdy Paddington
episodes.overview: The (not so) wild west is the setting for Mr. Gruber to live out his boyhood dream of being a cowboy, and that dream is a success thanks to cowbear Paddington's special way with steers. When a herd goes missing, our heroes hurry out with a "yeehaaa" to catch the rustler, and Paddington deals out his own brand of justice.

episodes.name: Paddington Goes Shopping
episodes.overview: During a simple shopping expedition, Paddington inadvertenly turns a window display topsy-turvy - to the delight of passing shoppers.

episodes.name: Paddington Gets a Raise
episodes.overview: It's Mr. Brown's birthday and, in his attempt to raise enough money to send him a telegram, Paddington takes a job as a model for a painting class. But our little hero quickly discovers that standing stock still for hours on end is not only frightfully boring, but leg-numbing as well. At Mr. Gruber's suggestion, he forgets about the telegram and gives Mr. Brown a singing telegram instead.

episodes.name: Bonhomme Paddington
episodes.overview: At the Quebec Winter Carnival, Paddington becomes great friends with the Bonhomme Carnival who encourages the young bear to put his paws to good use and participate in the festivities. Paddington and Mr. Gruber join a team for the canoe race across the frozen St. Lawrence, and because of Paddington, they win by a nose.

episodes.name: Everything Comes to Those Who Wait
episodes.overview: When Paddington goes out caroling one night, he ends up at a dinner party, mistaken for the waiter. And after the chef quits, it is up to our little hero to complete the meal. Baked Alaska? Oh. Paddington thought he heard Baked Elastic.

episodes.name: Paddington Hits Out
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry enters a gold competition with Paddington as his caddie. But when Mr. Curry ends up in the first aid tent after slipping on a marmalade sandwich, Paddington takes over for him - and wins a bag of shiny new golf clubs.

episodes.name: Ranger Paddington
episodes.overview: While on safari in Africa, Paddington sets out to protect his breakfast eggs from poachers, and because of his efforts, Mr. Gruber and the park ranger are captured by real poachers. It's up to Paddington to save the day, and the two villains fall victim to their own trap.

episodes.name: Paddington's Puzzle
episodes.overview: Paddington uses Mr. Curry's precious painting to make a jigsaw puzzle.

episodes.name: Paddington Cleans Up
episodes.overview: Paddington is sold a faulty vacuum-cleaners by a conman selling.

episodes.name: Riding High
episodes.overview: Paddington is at a horse-race, whehn a jocky is injured Paddington takes his place and wins.

episodes.name: Paddington Dines Out
episodes.overview: It's Paddington's birthday and the Browns give him a special treat; dinner at an expansive restaurant.

episodes.name: Paddington Keeps Fit
episodes.overview: Paddington buys a body builder, but Mr. Curry cons Paddington to get a money back guarantee, which backfires on him.

episodes.name: Paddington Goes to Washington
episodes.overview: Paddington visits Washington D.C.

episodes.name: Trouble at the Launderette
episodes.overview: Paddington does laundry at the launderette for Henry and Curry, and while it didn't go exactly as planned the attempt went better than ok.

episodes.name: The Case of the Doubtful Dummy
episodes.overview: Paddington is hoping to solve a mystery and eventually nabs a jewel-thief who was hoarding jewels in a dummy.

episodes.name: The Greatest Paddington on Earth
episodes.overview: Paddington joins a Chinese travelling circus. Paddington's accidents create new ideas for a successful performance.

episodes.name: Paddington Goes to Court
episodes.overview: Paddington visits a courthouse to see a trial in action, where Paddington gets mistaken for another "Mr. Brown".

episodes.name: The Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: Paddington goes treasure hunting to find  Mrs. Brown's wedding ring.

episodes.name: Paddington Goes to Hollywood
episodes.overview: Paddington takes a tour of Hollywood.

episodes.name: Mr. Gruber's Mystery Tour
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber takes Paddington to a wax museum, where waxworks are falling and being damaged.

episodes.name: Disappearing Trick
episodes.overview: Paddington develops an interest in magic and attempts to put on a magic show.

episodes.name: Paddington Saves the Day
episodes.overview: Paddington recalls a polo game he competed in to Jonathan and Judy.

episodes.name: Paddington Goes to School
episodes.overview: Paddington is required to attend school.

episodes.name: Old Master Paddington
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry accidentally mess up Henry's painting for an art contest

episodes.name: Paddington and the Pardon
episodes.overview: Paddington joins french a band.

episodes.name: A Picnic on the River
episodes.overview: Paddington ends up losing his hat while on a pic-a-nic.

episodes.name: A Day to Remember
episodes.overview: Paddington is asked to be ring-bearer at a wedding.

episodes.name: Paddington in Spain
episodes.overview: Paddington and Mr. Gruber help out with Maria and her family.

episodes.name: A Most Unusual Ceremony
episodes.overview: The Brown's are invited to a ceremony by Sir Huntley Martin.

episodes.name: Paddington Steps Out
episodes.overview: Paddington goes to a school play.

episodes.name: Paddington Prepares
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber has invited Paddington on a trip, but paddington loses his passport at the airport.

episodes.name: Paddington Recommended
episodes.overview: Paddington gets special treatment at a fancy restaurant.

episodes.name: Paddington goes to the Dentist
episodes.overview: Paddington Bear goes to the Dentist

episodes.name: Paddington's Dinosaurs
episodes.overview: Paddington stumbles upon a new type of fossil.

episodes.name: Paddington's First Flight
episodes.overview: Paddington goes water skiing.

episodes.name: Paddington Breaks the Peace
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry gets Paddington to do some gardening in the hopes of winning first prize in the best-garden contest.

episodes.name: Paddington Takes Off
episodes.overview: Paddington gets picked to replace an astronaught at NASA.

episodes.name: Trouble at Number Thirty-Two
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry asks Paddington too shovel snow out of his walkway.

episodes.name: Paddington in a Hole
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry starts asks Paddington to help with the garden.

episodes.name: Paddington in the Galapagos
episodes.overview: Paddington is visiting Galapagos islands, but a pair of documentery maker mistake him for a new species of animal and won't leave him alone.

episodes.name: Paddington Strikes a Bargain
episodes.overview: Paddington helps Mr. Gruber rebuild a vintage car.

episodes.name: Pantomime Time
episodes.overview: The Brown Family go to watch a pantomime.

episodes.name: Paddington in Alaska
episodes.overview: Paddington participates in a race for Lars Larson.

episodes.name: A Stitch in Time
episodes.overview: Paddington has to go sew Mr. Curry's clothes with an old sewing machine, but messes them up. The Sew Right company solves Paddington's problem.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Cold Snap
episodes.overview: Paddington messes about with Mr Curry's plumbing.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Yeti
episodes.overview: Paddington and Mr. Gruber travel into the mountains of Tibet.

episodes.name: Paddington Hits the Jackpot
episodes.overview: Paddington participates in a game-show.

episodes.name: Paddington Makes a Clean Sweep
episodes.overview: Paddington sweeps a chimney.

episodes.name: Paddington at the Olympics
episodes.overview: Paddington was accidentally chosen to represent Britain in the Olympics.

episodes.name: Paddington and Do it Yourself
episodes.overview: Paddington does more harm than good when attempting DIY.

episodes.name: In and out of Trouble
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry sets up a raggedy hammock, but doesn't want anyone else to know about it.

episodes.name: Sir Paddington
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber takes Paddington to a jousting-tournament.

episodes.name: A Spot of Decorating
episodes.overview: After seeing some construction-workers decorate a house Paddington tries to imitate it

episodes.name: Paddington in Touch
episodes.overview: Paddington plays rugby.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Dead Sea
episodes.overview: Paddington visits a luxurious spa on the shores of the Dead Sea

episodes.name: Goings On at Number Thirty Two
episodes.overview: Paddington and his Aunt go ahopping for a thank you gift.

episodes.name: A Sticky Time
episodes.overview: Paddington goes tp the hospital after he gets his limbs and chest glued together.

episodes.overview: Paddington and Mr. Gruber enroll in a military-school, and are rewarded for catching a pair of burglars.

episodes.name: Paddington Buys a Share
episodes.overview: Paddington becomes the latest victim of a conman.

episodes.name: Paddington Takes a Cut
episodes.overview: Paddington, thinking that's the art of  topiary is easy, decides to hack away at Mr. Curry's bushes.

episodes.name: Anchors Away
episodes.overview: Paddington and Mr. Gruber are on a cruise ship.

episodes.name: Paddington Passes Through
episodes.overview: Paddington visits a local television studio where he ends up being  broadcast live on three TV channels.

episodes.name: What's Going on at Number 32?
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown purchases a new television and antenna.

episodes.name: Paddington at the Stone Garden
episodes.overview: Paddington tells Mr. Curry a story of his trip to the Rock Garden in India.

episodes.name: Trouble in the Bargain Basement
episodes.overview: Paddington visits a bargain basement in a shopping centre.

episodes.name: Paddington Clocks In
episodes.overview: Paddington cause a bomb scare at a horse race.

episodes.name: Paddington goes Swiss
episodes.overview: Paddington outfits himself with ski gear to take a picture of the Matterhorn in Switzerland.

episodes.name: A Day by the Sea
episodes.overview: Paddington gets conned again, this time at the beach.

episodes.name: A House-Training
episodes.overview: Paddington finds a dog.

episodes.name: Dare Devil Bear
episodes.overview: Paddington agrees to do a wing walking act during an air show, all goes well until he realises the plane will be in flight.

episodes.name: Paddington the Rock Star
episodes.overview: Paddington and a rock-star temporarily switch identities.

episodes.name: The Amazing Paddington
episodes.overview: Paddington hypnotizes Mr. Curry into acting like various animal.

episodes.name: Pirates
episodes.overview: Paddington and Mr. Gruber check out the new pirate-ride at the local amusment park.

episodes.name: Paddington the Host
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry stubs his toe.

episodes.name: The Great Escape
episodes.overview: Paddington accidently stops some burglars targetting Mr. Curry's house.

episodes.name: The Paddington Files
episodes.overview: Paddington is convinced that Mr. Curry is an alien.

episodes.name: Paddington the Surveyor
episodes.overview: The fence separating the Brown's and Mr. Curry's back gardens becomes the topic of a neighborly argument when it appears that part of the Brown's garden is actually on Mr. Curry's land.

episodes.name: Mr. Curry's Birthday Bash
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry convinces Paddington that he's never had a birthday party.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Loch Ness Monster
episodes.overview: Paddington and Mr. Gruber visit Loch Ness.

episodes.name: Copybear
episodes.overview: Paddington delivers papers.

episodes.name: Paddington gets his Money's Worth
episodes.overview: Paddington loves reading comic books so Mr. Curry sells him some old ones.

episodes.name: Drive Bear Drive
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber loses his glasses during driving and Paddington decides to drive for him.

episodes.name: Paddington Delivers the Goods
episodes.overview: It's Mr. and Mrs. Brown's anniversary, Paddington has been sent to get the gift.

episodes.name: Paddington the Tour Guide
episodes.overview: Paddington takes a group of foreign tourists around town. Being foreign himself he assumes he'd be the best person for the job.

episodes.name: April Fools
episodes.overview: Mr. Curry sends Paddington on a fool's errand as a joke for april fools day.

episodes.name: Superstitious Paddington
episodes.overview: It's Friday, but not just any Friday, friday the 13th.

episodes.name: The Spy who Loved Marmalade
episodes.overview: Paddington unknowingly participates in a spy-mission to retrieve a suitcase full of top-secret valuables.

episodes.name: Paddington at Wimbledon
episodes.overview: Mr. Gruber takes Paddington to the famous tennis competition. A small misunderstanding lands him on center court.

episodes.name: Paddington in the Park
episodes.overview: The Royal Shakespeare Company are putting on a play in the local Park, Paddington is in charge of sound effects.

episodes.name: One Bear's Treasure
episodes.overview: Paddington decides to remove the clutter from the Brown's Family home and take it to the local Car-Boot sale.

episodes.name: A Bear of Style
episodes.overview: Paddington becomes the center of the Paris fashion scene.

episodes.name: A Night at the Opera
episodes.overview: Paddington makes friends with a famous Opera singer who loves his singing voice.

episodes.name: Paddington the Babysitter
episodes.overview: After Boasting about his own parenting abilities Mr. Curry is given his niece to babysit.

episodes.name: Paddington on the Orient Express
episodes.overview: Paddington has lunch on the famous train.

episodes.name: Paddington and the Frog Doom
episodes.overview: Paddington, pretending to be an archaeologist, buries one of Mrs. Birds tea pots.

episodes.name: The Royal Tour
episodes.overview: Paddington Brown from Darkest Peru rubs elbows with royalty and teaches them how to turn a party into a "PARTY!".

episodes.name: Gold Rush Paddington
episodes.overview: Paddington causes the towns people to start an hysterical gold panning frenzy after he finds a gold nugget.

episodes.name: Paddington Calls the Shots
episodes.overview: Paddington makes a movie for a film festival, things go wrong.
